entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [ARM64] `Vector128<T>.ExtractMostSignificantBits()` + `TrailingZeroCount` has better alternative than MoveMask emulation #87735
  • Microsoft.Bcl.AsyncInterfaces is missing API documentation #87722
  • .Net 7 performance regression with struct fields #87720
  • Mono: `Monitor.Enter()` is not interrupted by `Thread.Interrupt()` #87718

Closed

  • how to using LinkerArg with dotnet CLI #87730
  • Request for .NET Core Runtime Support for an Executable JavaScript Script Host #87724
  • JIT: Illegal forwardsub with physical promotion enabled (missing interference checks for assignment) #87614
    8.0.0
  • `ILLink.RoslynAnalyzer.DynamicallyAccessedMembersAnalyzer` threw an exception of type 'System.IndexOutOfRangeException' #87647
    8.0.0
  • [Feature Request] Diagnostic IPC command to dynamically add startup hook at diagnostic startup suspension #83756

PullRequests

Created

  • [arm64]Use pairwise store in `WidenAsciiToUtf16` #87737
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Fix the namespace of IServiceCollection.AddMetrics #87736
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] dotnet.exe prints error messages to console when launched with empty DOTNET_MULTILEVEL_LOOKUP #87734
    area-Host, 7.0.x
  • Support config binding ext methods in options assembly #87733
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Fix LocalUses::FindAccess #87732
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Add some limits in physical promotion #87729
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][ios] Add support for stripping during AOT compilation on iOS #87728
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Use analyzers from targeting pack for NetCoreAppCurrent #87726
    needs-area-label
  • Use local variable to evaluate property value only once in JsonSourceGenerator #87725
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Return Matrix.Identity from static field instead of creating it every time #87723
    area-System.Numerics
  • Email addresses in same domain not equal #87721
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Expand interpreter PackedSimd support #87719
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fix muxer handling of symlinks on Windows #87717
    area-Host

Merged

  • JIT: Regularize readbacks for parameters/OSR-locals in physical promotion #87165
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • CurrencyNegativePattern can be 16 #87671
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution
  • Enable CS1591 for projects that don't use intellisense package XML file #84917
    bug, area-Infrastructure-libraries, blocking-release, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Add a check for forward sub store interference #87615
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2203250 #87714
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Check Locations length before accessing #87659
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Invoke startup hook from ApplyStartupHook diagnostic command #87490
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution

Updated

  • Improve dynamic heap count #87619
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Optimize Ascii.Equals when widening #87141
    area-System.Text.Encoding
  • [nativeaot][tests] Add smoke unit runtime tests for Native AOT on iOS platforms #87260
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Share UTF8 converters between coreclr and mono #85558
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Don't emit nor generate the manifest for NativeRuntimeEventSource #86850
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • Options validation source generator #87587
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • Expose a `Lock` type in preview mode #87672
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [browser] make cwraps more conditional #87274
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Import isinst/castclass Nullable as underlying type #87241
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • add zero byte read to SslStream #87563
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.0
  • GetProcessInfo3 diagnostic command #87707
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Optimize scalar conversions with AVX512 #84384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [NativeAOT] allow creating CCW for resurrected objects #86882
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Change JitGuardedDevirtualizationChainStatements to 1 #87437
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • GDV: don't emit fallback call if classes are "exact" #87055
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • LSRA-throughput: Iterate over the regMaskTP instead all registers #87424
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Keyed Services Support to Dependency Injection #87183
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, api-ready-for-review
